content:
Even though they say that,
from what I've seen, Mobai and Glenn
are actually quite reliable.
info: 采集树枝-莎莎-闲聊_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Even though Glenn hasn't told me directly,
I know he's ordered several more shipments of daily necessities!
info: 采集树枝-莎莎-闲聊_莎莎任务闲聊
采集树枝-莎莎-闲聊_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
After that? I'll take everyone with me,
from our world bubble to all sorts of amazing places!
That's what Mobai meant by "the new Astralink needs Sani"!

content:
Shaking trees is simple,
Just <color=#38b6c5>press and hold the left mouse button</color> on a tree.
Shake shake shake—

content:
I heard Mobai needs branches?
My little car runs on Lumia bottles,
The Tea Stove runs on charcoal,
info: 采集树枝-莎莎-闲聊_莎莎任务闲聊

content: Huh?! W-Wait... was all that just reverse psychology to get me to join?! I bet they wouldn't dare. Yep.
info: 采集树枝-莎莎-闲聊_莎莎任务闲聊

content: However, helping everyone get started with their new Astralink life here is my current mission~!

content:
These trees are way too tall,
I have to <color=#38b6c5>scroll my mouse</color>
just to see what's up there.
info: 采集树枝-莎莎-闲聊_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
I didn't stay for those two,
I stayed for... for...
For you and Frostia!

content: After all, protecting my neighbors' safety is my important mission!

content:
So, I've been waiting here, but...
Something's weird?
Looks like no cars have come by since we got here.

content:
So...
What are we gonna do with the branch?

content:
Hmm, I won't go for now.
Mobai and Glenn said this is an uncharted new Astralink,
and they won't make it without me.

content:
I'm not short at all~!
I'm 6 feet tall!
       <size=30>...when my ears are perked up.</size>

content: So no more adventuring for you?

I'll pick up the ones near the trees,
You shake the trees to get more, deal?

content:
I'm from the Driftingale Association, have you heard of us?
We, the Driftingale Association,
Are professional! We travel! We explore! We adventure!
